text.__SUMMARY__: Narcissus cantabricus is a species of the genus Narcissus (Daffodils) in the family Amaryllidaceae. It is classified in Section Bulbocodium.
text.Distribution and habitat: Narcissus cantabricus is native to the central and southern Iberian Peninsula and northwest Africa (Morocco and Algeria)
text.Bibliography: Abílio Fernandes. The Rehabilitation of Narcissus Cantabricus DC. Kew Bulletin Vol. 12, No. 3 (1957), pp. 373-385
